name: First step to becoming a storage manager

pages.text: Welcome to Maid Storage Manager :)$(br2)Maid Storage Manager provides a new task ‘Storage Manager’. With a proper configuration, maids in this task can perform a number of tasks such as searching for items, sorting and storage, auto-crafting, and logistical transportation.

When a maid is assigned as a storage manager, she will automatically pick up nearby drops and store them in the surrounding chests. $(br2) By default, the maid checks multiple chests to ensure that as many of the same items as possible are in one chest.
